my_business: At Diya Fintax Solutions, we provide comprehensive accounting and compliance services tailored for startups, professionals, and growing businesses. Our aim is to simplify finances so that entrepreneurs can stay focused on building their ventures. We handle bookkeeping, GST registration and filings, income tax returns, TDS compliance, ROC filings, and complete business registrations including proprietorship, partnership, LLP, and private limited companies. We also assist with obtaining regulatory licenses such as Import Export Code (IEC), Labour License, Trade License, and FSSAI License, along with preparing financial projections and documentation for business and MSME loans.
top_product: GST Registration, Filing & Compliance, Income Tax Return Filings
ideal_referral: A business owner who’s tired of late filings and wants peace of mind with a proactive accountant.
top_problem_solved: Regularizing accounts and filing returns for clients who haven’t filed GST or income tax for multiple years
my_favourite_bni_story: My favorite BNI story is not just about business, but personal growth. I joined as an accountant, but BNI taught me how to confidently present, network, and build a brand of trust.
